dyn_ham_scoop.name: Dynamic Hamstring Scoop
dyn_ham_scoop.instruction: Step forward, heel down, scoop ground.

hip_opener.name: Dynamic Hip Opener
hip_opener.instruction: Deep lunge, rotate torso toward front knee.

cossack_sq.name: Cossack Squat
cossack_sq.instruction: Wide stance, sit into one heel. Alternating.
